channel.title: Posts on icahoon.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on icahoon.dev

item.title: Channel Axioms
item.description: test A send to a nil channel blocks forever. A receive from a nil channel blocks forever. A send to a closed channel panics. A receive from a closed channel returns the zero value immediately. via Dave Cheney

item.title: Automation
item.description: Hire the people who will automate themselves out of a job, then just keep giving them jobs. – Jessie Frazelle
